markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Snagging Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=4773) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=127) (Level 4), [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=270) (Level 4)

**Requirements**
You have one hand free, and your target is within reach of that hand

</column>

---

You combine an attack with quick grappling moves to throw an enemy off balance as long as it stays in your reach. Make a Strike while keeping one hand free. If this Strike hits, the target is off-guard until the start of your next turn or until it’s no longer within the reach of your hand, whichever comes first.
name: Snagging Strike
requirement: You have one hand free, and your target is within reach of that hand
requirement_markdown: You have one hand free, and your target is within reach of that hand
